comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: We should probably consider `$ProgressView` where we can default to a much simpler progress bar that takes less time/cpu to draw.  The current progress bar has to redraw the entire space include whitespace.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Previously we did a fix to perform thinning only locally. This means that progress records in a huge number are still transmitted remotely.
